description: Try our easy to follow Smoky Barbecue Chicken Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoky Barbecue Chicken Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 125 g roasted capsicum from a jar

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the topping sauce over the dough, leaving a small border around the edge. Mix together the chicken and barbecue sauce and spread over the pizza. Arrange the peppers and mozzarella on top and bake in a preheated oven, 200°C, for 15 minutes until the base is cooked and the topping is golden.

Spread the topping sauce over the dough, leaving a small border around the edge. Mix together the chicken and barbecue sauce and spread over the pizza. Arrange the peppers and mozzarella on top and bake in a preheated oven, 200°C, for 15 minutes until the base is cooked and the topping is golden.

Spread the topping sauce over the dough, leaving a small border around the edge. Mix together the chicken and barbecue sauce and spread over the pizza. Arrange the peppers and mozzarella on top and bake in a preheated oven, 200°C, for 15 minutes until the base is cooked and the topping is golden.
